virtual void OnActivate (Menu *menu, AbstractMenuAccessor *parent_accessor)
 This method will be called every time the MenuAccessor will be activated (after changing a menu level).

class Menu

Detailed Description

Obsolete - the class Menu, which uses the AbstractMenuAccessor, has been replaced by the classes ItemMenu and ItemTree.
